Subject: [Jun 2022] Error while trying to clear shadow files of a specific computer
Description:
Current case is a copy of a case created on 30-Jun-2022 and that didn't get migrated to Netwrix Support Portal.

Initial description: "Oops! An error Occurred" message displayed under System Maintenance > File Maintenance > Shadow Files when searching for shadows created by a computer having a high quantity of File Shadows associated. Reproducing on two different browsers. 

A remote session was organized on 22-Jul-2022 to clean up File Shadows and the recommendation to use File Shadow Repository with Azure File was made at that point.
Solution_Comment__c: The issue was solved after updating to 5940
